name: Plutenka
description:
Yohan wakes up sealed within a castle's dungeons due to an incident. Belonging to a small desert village was chased by bandits and branded as cursed due to his facial features, so he had to escape through the desert, where he fell unconscious. 

Upon awakening, he finds himself in a dungeon, isolated. He must use his intelligence and plan a strategy to escape from the fortress.

This prototype of a platformer-adventure game, with a mysterious touch, is based on Vagrant Story and Ico in terms of theme, atmosphere,  aesthetic and gameplay.

 The current game state is a fully playable demo, so it has a level with one room, although I expect to keep developing it in the future.

A game by IvyHatsu, developed with Unreal Engine 4 (expect some little glitches).

Available on Windows and Linux.
